title: Drawing, "Design for Hebrew Inscription for Ark Curtain, Beth Am Synagogue, Los Altos, California", 1968–69
medium: Brush and watercolor, graphite on white wove paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite on image, lower right:  1
dimensions: 33.3 x 98.8 cm (13 1/8 x 39 in. ), irregular sheet
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Rose colored Hebrew inscription, in four lines, interspersed with colored images of a menorah, two hands, pomegranate, and a etrog (citron).
